definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
a moment/a while/in a moment/now...now.../also pr. [yi1 hui3 r5]
one's employment/business/matter that needs to be settled/(northern dialect) (of a person) demanding/trying/troublesome/erhua variant of 事[shi4]/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1]

sentences.english: His old legs and shoulders pivoted with the swinging of the pulling.
sentences.chinese: 他一把把地拉着，兩條老邁的腿兒和肩膀跟着轉動。

sentences.english: The land is covered in shrubs.
The gold peal son station rises and unexpectedly wants Pan teacher in pique.
sentences.chinese: 金鈴兒憤然站起，竟是要叛師。

sentences.english: Sophie:Now wash them, then dice the potatoes and bell peppers. Then slice the meat.
sentences.chinese: 現在把他們都洗乾淨，青椒和土豆切成丁兒，肉切片。

sentences.english: What I'm wondering is, is Giselle doing the right thing?
sentences.chinese: 我懷疑的是吉賽兒做的決定是對的嗎？

sentences.english: If it doesn t crunch or crinkle, he wont eat it.
sentences.chinese: 不能發出嘎吱作響或者沙沙聲兒的食物他是不會喫的。

sentences.english: With this and my black coat, I’ll be dressed for the season.
sentences.chinese: 再加上那件黑大褂兒，我這一季的衣服就全了。

sentences.english: I had to buy a new pair of laces for my tennis shoes.
sentences.chinese: 我得爲我的網球鞋買雙新鞋帶兒。

sentences.english: But the noteworthy history still haunts this meeting.
sentences.chinese: 但那段兒著名的歷史仍然“陰魂不散”。

sentences.english: One should bring a flashlight when walking in mountains at night.
sentences.chinese: 夜裏走山路，應該帶上電棒兒。
當然，機器人不能嘮閒嗑兒。

sentences.english: You are leaving one by one, my sons.
sentences.chinese: 一個一個都走了，我的兒啊。

sentences.english: If we don't hurry up the store will have been closing before we get there.
sentences.chinese: 咱們如不快一些兒，等我們到了那兒，店門就會關了。

sentences.english: There is something fishy behind this.
Obese children are at risk to atherosclerosis.
sentences.chinese: 肥胖兒的確有發生動脈粥樣硬化的危險。

definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
